titleStmt.title: A resolution of three matrimonial cases by John Turner.
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, b. 1649 or 50.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Hills jun., for Walter Kettilby,

notesStmt.note: "Viz. I. Whether it be lawful for a man to marry his deceased wife's sister's daughter? II. Whether the half-blood make kindred? III. Whether such a marriage being made, it ought to be dissolv'd or no?"
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
